description: The Universidad La Gran Colombia (UGC) in Armenia has committed to being the green university of the coffee-growing region for over 15 years. Celebrating its 54th anniversary, the university integrates environmental responsibility into its educational framework, ensuring all programs include sustainability competencies. Through initiatives like environmental volunteering, research projects, and a network of green programs, the university fosters a culture of environmental awareness among students and the broader community, aiming to positively impact the environment.
name: UGC Armenia
